item.description:
Ok, so attendance has been pretty pathetic at recent meetups and we've had some complaints that there are no weekend events....so come to pub night Saturday night! We'll meet at the outdoor bar at Salvation Cafe and make our way down to Fastnet or Celtica and if we're feeling especially adventurous to the Pelham. What better way to enjoy a summer night then having drinks with new friends? See you there.
-John

PS If we don't get a decent turnout by Saturday afternoon I'll cancel, so watch the site.
item.name: Pub Night!
